Data Fields
MMWave_MCB_t Struct Reference
mmWave API » mmWave Internal Data Structures

mmWave Control MCB More...

#include <control/mmwave/include/mmwave_internal.h>

Data Fields

MMWave_InitCfg initCfg
 Initialization configuration which was used to initialize the control module.
 
MMWave_OpenCfg openCfg
 Configuration which is used to open the control module.
 
MMWave_CalibrationCfg calibrationCfg
 Calibration configuration which is used to start the control module.
 
MMWave_DFEDataOutputMode dfeDataOutputMode
 DFE Data output mode: This is valid only when the mmWave module is in the following states:- Full Configuration - Configured State Minimal Configuration - Start State.
 
Mbox_Handle bssMailbox
 Handle to the BSS Mailbox: This is used to communicate the mmWave link messages to the BSS.
 
CRC_Handle crcHandle
 CRC Driver channel handle: This is the handle to the CRC driver if configured to use the driver else this is set to NULL.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle linkSemHandle
 This is the semaphore handle which is used to handle the messages exchanged between the MSS/DSS and BSS.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle cfgSemHandle
 This is the semaphore handle which is used to protect the chirp/profile configuration while operating in FULL configuration mode.
 
MMWave_SpawnFxnNode spawnTable [MMWAVE_MAX_NUM_SPAWN_LIST]
 This is the spawn table used by the free & active lists.
 
MMWave_SpawnFxnNode * ptrSpawnFxnFreeList
 List which tracks all the nodes in the spawn free list.
 
MMWave_SpawnFxnNode * ptrSpawnFxnActiveList
 List which tracks all the nodes in the spawn list which are to be executed.
 
MMWave_Profile * ptrProfileList
 List which tracks all the profiles which have been created.
 
MMWave_BpmChirp * ptrBpmChirpList
 List which tracks all the BPM configurations which have been created.
 
volatile uint32_t linkStatus
 Status of the mmWave Link: This can be changed from multiple execution contexts.
 
uint32_t status
 Status of the mmWave control module:
 
uint32_t spawnOverflow
 Counter which tracks the number of times the spawn list overflowed.
 
uint32_t spawnCounter
 Counter which tracks the number of times the spawn was invoked.
 
uint32_t wResetCounter
 Counter which tracks the number of times the write reset was invoked.
 
rlVersion_t version
 Version Information which is stored once the link is operational.
 

Detailed Description

mmWave Control MCB

The structure is used to store all the relevant information required to execute the mmWave control module.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
